query.name: barnByNumber
query.jpql: select b from elevator_Barn b where b.number = :number

query.name: allVehicle
query.jpql: select v from elevator_Vehicle v order by v.number

query.name: allConsignmentNoteReceipt
query.jpql: select u from elevator_ConsignmentNoteReceipt u order by u.date

query.name: allConsignmentNoteReceipt
query.jpql: select u from elevator_ConsignmentNoteReceipt u order by u.date

query.name: organizationByIds
query.jpql: select o from elevator_Organization o where o.id in :ids
